channel.title: CVE Feed for ICONICS and Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICONICS and Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-40264|2024-08-03T12:14:40.199Z -- iconics%20and%20mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- genesis64
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ICONICS/Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 versions 10.96 to 10.97.2 allows an unauthenticated attacker to create, tamper with or destroy arbitrary files by getting a legitimate user import a project package file crafted by the attacker.
